evals.prompt: Tôi cần tạo design system từ trang https://templates.envytheme.com/fila/project-management.html — extract toàn bộ colors, typography rồi generate cho tôi bộ React components và doc site luôn nhé
evals.expected_output: Full pipeline: harvest URL → show token preview for confirmation → generate 22 React components → generate doc site HTML → validate TypeScript compilation

evals.prompt: I have a Tailwind-based React project at ./src and I want to extract the design tokens from it and rebuild them as a Semi Design theme package. Can you create the full design system with components?
evals.expected_output: Source code extraction pipeline: parse tailwind.config.js + CSS variables → map to Semi tokens → show preview → generate components + theme package + docs

evals.prompt: Take a look at https://demo.themeselection.com/materio-bootstrap-html-admin-template/html/vertical-menu-template/dashboards-crm.html and create a design token file with Semi Design variables. I just need the CSS tokens and a preview, not the full components yet
evals.expected_output: Partial pipeline: harvest URL → map tokens → validate → show preview HTML. Should NOT generate components since user only asked for tokens
